badge_template_activities.title: This course covers the fundamentals of building IT infrastructure on the AWS platform. The course also covers how to create fledgling architectures and build them into robust and adaptive solutions

50c3323e-10ff-4a41-b373-d2ae39d18beb.description: Тhis badge confirms that the individual has successfully completed the official ISTQB Automation Software Tester Academy. The official academy is designed for all those who want to qualify, retrain and enter the field of software testing, such as manual and automatic software tester. Academy with 200 classes, that prepares the students with knowledge for manual testing, Agile testing, HTML5, JavaScript, CSS3, C# and Selenium Web Driver.
50c3323e-10ff-4a41-b373-d2ae39d18beb.name: ISTQB Automation Software Tester Academy

badge_template_activities.title: ISTQB Software Testing Foundation - This is a foundation level course designed to provide participants with an understanding of some of the fundamental principles of testing.

ISTQB Foundation Extension Agile Tester - Agile testing is a relatively new approach to software testing that follows the principles of agile software development as outlined in the Agile Manifesto. A tester on an Agile project will work differently than one working on a traditional project. Testers must understand the values and principles that underpin Agile projects, and how testers are an integral part of a whole-team approach together with developers and business representatives.
20480: Programming with HTML5, JavaScript and CSS3 - This course provides an introduction to HTML5 and CSS3. Helps listeners gain basic programming skills on HTML5 and CSS3.
20483: Programming in C# - The C# programming language is crucial for understanding and learning how you can later apply this knowledge to automatic testing.

A4Q Certified Selenium Tester Foundation Level Automation Testing - Upon successful completion of this course, you will be able to create and run tests with Selenium WebDriver on your own. In this course you will combine and use all the acquired knowledge from the previous modules.

ce1e84da-a460-40f5-b839-a500ecbb33c2.description: This badge certifies that this individual has successfully completed the official Oracle Database 12c: Introduction to SQL course at Semos Education.
ce1e84da-a460-40f5-b839-a500ecbb33c2.name: Oracle Database 12c: Introduction to SQL

badge_template_activities.title: This course will help you understand the advanced features of SQL. Learning these features will help you query and manipulate data within the database, use the dictionary views to retrieve metadata and create reports about their schema objects. Some of the date-time functions available in the Oracle Database are also covered. This course also discusses how to use the regular expression support in SQL through expert instruction.

skills.name: Control database access to specific objects
Control privileges at the object and system level
Create reports of sorted and restricted data
Manage objects with data dictionary views
Retrieve row and column data from tables
Understand the basic concepts of relational databases

a694fa37-8227-40f0-ac28-7401c84e479d.description: This badge certifies that this individual has successfully completed the official AZ-500: Microsoft Azure Security Technologies course at Semos Education, Microsoft Gold Learning Partner.
a694fa37-8227-40f0-ac28-7401c84e479d.name: AZ-500: Microsoft Azure Security Technologies

badge_template_activities.title: This course is for Azure Security Engineers who are planning to take the associated certification exam, or who are performing security tasks in their day-to-day job. This course would also be helpful to an engineer that wants to specialize in providing security for Azure-based digital platforms and play an integral role in protecting an organization's data.

skills.name: Conditional Access And AAD Identity Protection

4d47a865-dccb-41cf-93f4-415315484ee8.description: This badge certifies that this individual has successfully completed the official DP-500: Designing and Implementing Enterprise-Scale Analytics Solutions Using Microsoft Azure and Microsoft Power BI course at Semos Education, Microsoft Gold Learning Partner
4d47a865-dccb-41cf-93f4-415315484ee8.name: DP-500: Designing and Implementing Enterprise-Scale Analytics Solutions Using Microsoft Azure and Microsoft Power BI

badge_template_activities.title: This course covers methods and practices for performing advanced data analytics at scale. Students will build on existing analytics experience and will learn to implement and manage a data analytics environment, query and transform data, implement and manage data models, and explore and visualize data. In this course, students will use Microsoft Purview, Azure Synapse Analytics, and Power BI to build analytics solutions.

skills.name: Choose a Power BI model framework
Create and manage scalable Power BI dataflows
Discover trusted data using Microsoft Purview
Explore Azure data services for modern analytics
Manage Power BI assets by using Microsoft Purview
Use Azure Synapse Serverless SQL Pool to Query Files in a Data Lake

79ebcb5f-4886-46e0-9c8b-38e4b32c4bdb.description: This badge certifies that this individual has successfully completed the official MS-101: Microsoft 365 Mobility and Security course at Semos Education, Microsoft Gold Learning Partner
79ebcb5f-4886-46e0-9c8b-38e4b32c4bdb.name: MS-101: Microsoft 365 Mobility and Security

badge_template_activities.title: This course covers three central elements of Microsoft 365 enterprise administration – Microsoft 365 security management, Microsoft 365 compliance management, and Microsoft 365 device management. Students will examine all the common types of threat vectors and data breaches facing organizations today. Students will learn how to manage the Microsoft 365 security services, including Exchange Online Protection, Advanced Threat Protection, Safe Attachments, and Safe Links.

cf5c7e36-895a-415c-985d-b8accd8d25d2.description: This badge certifies that this individual has successfully completed the official PL-200: Microsoft Power Platform Functional Consultant course at Semos Education, Microsoft Gold Learning Partner.
cf5c7e36-895a-415c-985d-b8accd8d25d2.name: PL-200: Microsoft Power Platform Functional Consultant

badge_template_activities.title: In this course, students will learn to perform discovery, capture requirements, engage subject matter experts and stakeholders, translate requirements, and configure Power Platform solutions and apps. They will supplement their learnings with hands-on labs to create application enhancements, custom user experiences, data conversions, custom process automation etc. Power Platform is comprised of four key products: Power Apps, Power Automate, Power BI, and Power Virtual Agents.

fc2f99ec-5378-4c9f-a2a1-8c18d2aa503f.description: This badge certifies that this individual has successfully completed the official 20480-C: Programming in HTML5 with JavaScript and CSS3 course at Semos Education, Microsoft Gold Learning Partner.
fc2f99ec-5378-4c9f-a2a1-8c18d2aa503f.name: 20480-C: Programming in HTML5 with JavaScript and CSS3

badge_template_activities.title: This course provides an introduction to HTML5, CSS3, and JavaScript. This course helps students gain basic HTML5/CSS3/JavaScript programming skills. This course is an entry point into both the Web application and Windows Store apps training paths. The course focuses on using HTML5/CSS3/JavaScript to implement programming logic, define and use variables, perform looping and branching, develop user interfaces, capture and validate user input, store data, and create well-structured applications.

skills.name: Adding Offline Support To Web Applications
Communicating With A Remote Data Source
Introduction To The Document Object Model

6ec11141-50c2-459b-8a6e-b086b6c87531.description: This badge certifies that this individual has successfully completed the official Implementing and Operating Cisco Collaboration Core Technologies (CLCOR) v1.0 course
6ec11141-50c2-459b-8a6e-b086b6c87531.name: Implementing and Operating Cisco Collaboration Core Technologies (CLCOR)

badge_template_activities.title: The Implementing and Operating Cisco Collaboration Core Technologies (CLCOR) v1.0 course helps you prepare for advanced-level roles focused on implementation and operation of Cisco collaboration solutions. You will gain the knowledge and skills needed to implement and deploy core collaboration and networking technologies, including infrastructure and design, protocols, codecs, and endpoints, Cisco Internetwork Operating System (IOS®) XE gateway, and media resources, Quality of Service (QoS),etc.

skills.name: Analyzing Quality Issues In Converged Networks
